actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator McCain with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 104-362.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 581.

official_title: A bill to provide for certain benefits of the Missouri River basin Pick-Sloan project to the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe, and for other purposes.
short_title: Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996

summary.text: Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996 - Establishes, in the Treasury, the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund which shall receive funds from the power program of the Pick-Sloan Missouri River basin program until a specified Fund aggregate is attained. Directs the Tribe, in consultation with the Secretaries of the Interior and of Health and Human Services, to develop a plan for the socioeconomic recovery and cultural preservation of the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe. Authorizes appropriations.
